meanings.definition: The activity of setting up a business or businesses, taking on financial risks in the hope of profit.
meanings.sent1: Entrepreneurship involves creating new businesses and taking financial risks to make money.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of success through entrepreneurship by starting their own companies.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show highlighted the chaos that can ensue when a group of friends tries entrepreneurship together.
meanings.sent4: Her entrepreneurship was like planting seeds in a garden, hoping they would grow into a fruitful harvest.
meanings.sent5: The book vividly described the journey of entrepreneurship as a rollercoaster of challenges and rewards.

meanings.definition: The process of starting a business or other organization.
meanings.sent1: Entrepreneurship requires careful planning and execution to establish a successful company.
meanings.sent2: Learning about entrepreneurship in school can inspire students to become future business owners.
meanings.sent3: The magician's act humorously portrayed the magic of entrepreneurship in turning ideas into reality.
meanings.sent4: In the world of entrepreneurship, each new venture is like a blank canvas waiting to be painted with success.
meanings.sent5: The documentary captured the essence of entrepreneurship as a journey from vision to enterprise.
